refnamediv.refpurpose: Function to determine permutation importance of knn models, and optionally plot results. based on R2 value.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [pij, R2] = permutation_importance(x, y, B) [pij, R2] = permutation_importance(x, y, B, repeats) [pij, R2] = permutation_importance(x, y, B, repeats, fig) [pij, R2] = permutation_importance(x, y, B, repeats, fig, labels)

listitem.para: n x 1 vector describing overall variable importance
m x repeats matrix of resulting R2 values
n x m matrix of input parameters, each column represents a different parameter
n x p matrix of target values, each column represents a different variable
integer value determining how many permutations to execute
boolean variable indicating if plots should be made or suppressed, default %f
row vector of strings describing the input variables

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Function to investigate permutation variable importance of trained neural network
